sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-main>
    <el-form :inline="true"
             :model="casedata">
      <el-form-item label="流程名称">
        <el-input v-model="casedata.name"
                  placeholder=""></el-input>
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item>
        <el-button type="primary"
                   @click="onSubmit">查询</el-button>
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
    <el-table :data=handleList.slice((currentPage-1)*pageSize,currentPage*pageSize)
              style="width: 100%">
      <el-table-column type="expand">
        <template slot-scope="props">
          <http-card :api="props.row"></http-card>
        </template>
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column prop="name"
                       label="流程名称"
                       width="200">
        <!-- <el-tag type="danger" prop="status"></el-tag> -->
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column label="Method"
                       prop="method">
      </el-table-column>
      <el-table-column label="Url"
                       prop="simpleUrl">
      </el-table-column>
    </el-table>
    <el-pagination @size-change="handleSizeChange"
                   @current-change="handleCurrentChange"
                   :current-page="currentPage"
                   :page-sizes="[10, 20, 30, 50, 100]"
                   :page-size="pageSize"
                   layout="total, sizes, prev, pager, next, jumper"
                   :total="handleList.length">
    </el-pagination>
  </el-main>
</template>

<script>
import HttpCard from "@/views/apimanager/httpcard.vue"
export default {
  data () {
    return {
      handleList: [],
      // 当前页
      currentPage: 1,
      // 每页多少条
      pageSize: 10,
      casedata: { name: '' },
      tableData: [],
      test: ''
    }
  },
  components: {
    HttpCard
  },
  methods: {
    onSubmit () {
      console.log(this.$route.params.casename)
      var tableData = []
      for (var i = 0; i < this.tableData.length; i++) {
        console.log(this.tableData[i])
        if (this.tableData[i].name == this.casedata.name || this.casedata.name == "" || this.casedata.name == null) {
          var apis = this.tableData[i].apis
          for (var j = 0; j < apis.length; j++) {
            var item = apis[j]
            item.name = this.tableData[i].name
            tableData.push(item)
          }
        }
      }
      this.handleList = tableData
      this.$route.params.casename = ""
    },
    // 每页多少条
    handleSizeChange (val) {
      this.pageSize = val;
    },
    // 当前页
    handleCurrentChange (val) {
      this.currentPage = val;
    },
    OnResponse (cases) {
      var tableData = []
      for (var i = 0; i < cases.length; i++) {
        var apis = cases[i].apis
        for (var j = 0; j < apis.length; j++) {
          var item = apis[j]
          tableData.push(item)
        }
      }
      this.handleList = tableData
      this.tableData = cases
      this.onSubmit()
    },
    handleCheck (index, row) {
      console.log(index, row);
    },
    handleTest (index, row) {
      console.log(index, row);
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.casedata.name = this.$route.params.casename
    var _that = this;
    this.$client.notifyws.notifyBus.$on("WebApiScaperData", function (res) {
      _that.OnResponse(res.data.cases)
    }),
      this.$axios.get(this.$client.apiUrlprefix() + "/webapiscraper/result", {}, function (res) {
        console.log(res)
        if (res) {
          if (res.data.retcode == 0) {
            console.log(res.data.result.cases)
            _that.OnResponse(res.data.result.cases)
            return true;
          } else {
            return false;
          }
        }
      })
  }
}
</script>
